boat.full_description: Tunstall Tide is one of the first Gaffling 4.1 hulls, being built from a hull only kit cut by Demon Yachts. She was built by school pupils in the North East under the supervision of Martin Haigh. Her intended use is to introduce school pupils to the joys of Gaff Rig, while the process of building the dinghy created an opportunity for less academically interested pupils to gain experience in practical skills.
boat.name: Tunstall Tide
